p: Aerial parts of Salvia mirzayanii were harvested before the flowering stage in September 2012 from southern regions of Iran, Bandar Abbas (Hormozgan province), and was identified and confirmed (Voucher No. 663) by Dr Mahmoodreza Moein in the Museum of Medicinal Plants, Department of Pharmacognosy, Shiraz University of Medical Sciences, Shiraz, Iran.
